channel.title: Changing shop currency
channel.description:
Ok, so i have created minigames and you get ticket rewards, how do i create a shop [this is ONE shop not all the shops in the game] to work with that currency?
basically
in Runescape theres fight pits and you can use tokkul but in other shops in runescape you use money
I want to apply this to my server
Please help!
thanks!
